Close Out Day

  • This action signs everyone out.
  • Artists that are currently seated will be excluded from the next lottery
    • because they have not yet signed out.
  • The standby list will be cleared.

Generate Test Data

This will generate random artists for testing. The database will be completely reset. This action can not be undone.

Raw Artist Data Editor

This editor allows you to edit raw artist data. It is designed only to be used as a diagnostics tool. Please use with care.

Full Reset

This will completely reset your database. This action can not be undone.

Run Lottery

  • All artists must be signed out before running the lottery. To do this quickly, run Close Out Day.
  • The results are picked from artists that are marked as 'eligible' for the lottery.
  • Artists that are picked will be added to the top of the standby list.
